conclusion: Analyze the direction of the baffles to predict liquid flow.
Baffle A is pointing towards the left.
Baffle B is pointing towards the right.
Baffle C is pointing towards the left.
Liquid through baffle A will likely move to the left.
Liquid through baffle B will likely move to the right.
Liquid through baffle C will likely move to the left.
Liquid through baffles A and C will move left to container D.
Liquid through baffle B will move right to container G.
Liquid will flow into containers D and G.
